Deprecated API

  • Interfaces
  • Classes

  • Interfaces 
    Interface Description
    org.helixj.core.listeners.BlockChainListener
    org.helixj.core.listeners.PeerConnectionEventListener
    Use the single event interfaces instead
    org.helixj.wallet.listeners.WalletEventListener
    Use the superinterfaces directly instead.

    Class Description
    org.helixj.core.listeners.AbstractBlockChainListener
    org.helixj.core.listeners.AbstractPeerConnectionEventListener

    org.helixj.core.listeners.AbstractPeerEventListener
    org.helixj.store.MasternodeDB
    org.helixj.wallet.listeners.AbstractWalletEventListener
  • Fields 
    Field Description
    org.helixj.core.Transaction.SIGHASH_ANYONECANPAY_VALUE
    Instead use SigHash.ANYONECANPAY.value or SigHash.ANYONECANPAY.byteValue() as appropriate.
    org.helixj.script.ScriptOpCodes.OP_NOP2
    org.helixj.uri.HelixURI.BITCOIN_SCHEME
  • Methods 
    Method Description
    org.helixj.core.AbstractBlockChain.addListener​(BlockChainListener)
    org.helixj.core.AbstractBlockChain.removeListener​(BlockChainListener)
    org.helixj.core.NetworkParameters.prodNet()
    org.helixj.core.NetworkParameters.regTests()
    org.helixj.core.NetworkParameters.testNet()
    org.helixj.core.NetworkParameters.testNet2()
    org.helixj.core.NetworkParameters.testNet3()
    org.helixj.core.NetworkParameters.unitTests()
    org.helixj.core.Peer.addEventListener​(AbstractPeerEventListener)
    org.helixj.core.Peer.removeEventListener​(AbstractPeerEventListener)
    org.helixj.core.PeerGroup.addEventListener​(AbstractPeerEventListener, Executor)
    org.helixj.core.PeerGroup.awaitRunning()
    org.helixj.core.PeerGroup.awaitTerminated()
    org.helixj.core.PeerGroup.getMemoryPool()
    org.helixj.core.PeerGroup.removeEventListener​(AbstractPeerEventListener)
    org.helixj.core.Sha256Hash.create​(byte[])
    org.helixj.core.Sha256Hash.createDouble​(byte[])
    org.helixj.core.TransactionInput.getFromAddress()
    org.helixj.crypto.TransactionSignature.decodeFromBitcoin​(byte[], boolean)
    use {@link #decodeFromBitcoin(byte[], boolean, boolean} instead}.
    org.helixj.script.Script.correctlySpends​(Transaction, long, Script)
    Use Script.correctlySpends(org.helixj.core.Transaction, long, org.helixj.script.Script, java.util.Set) instead so that verification flags do not change as new verification options are added.
    org.helixj.script.Script.executeScript​(Transaction, long, Script, LinkedList<byte[]>, boolean)
    Use Script.executeScript(org.helixj.core.Transaction, long, org.helixj.script.Script, java.util.LinkedList, java.util.Set) instead.
    org.helixj.script.Script.getFromAddress​(NetworkParameters)
    org.helixj.script.Script.isSentToP2SH()
    org.helixj.wallet.Wallet.addEventListener​(WalletEventListener, Executor)
    org.helixj.wallet.Wallet.addKey​(ECKey)
    org.helixj.wallet.Wallet.addKeys​(List<ECKey>)
    org.helixj.wallet.Wallet.calculateAllSpendCandidates​(boolean)
    Use Wallet.calculateAllSpendCandidates(boolean, boolean) or the zero-parameter form instead.
    org.helixj.wallet.Wallet.getChangeAddress()
    use Wallet.currentChangeAddress() instead.
    org.helixj.wallet.Wallet.getWatchedBalance()
    Use Wallet.getBalance() instead as including watched balances is now the default behaviour
    org.helixj.wallet.Wallet.maybeDoMaintenance​(KeyParameter, boolean)
    Renamed to doMaintenance
    org.helixj.wallet.Wallet.removeEventListener​(WalletEventListener)
    use the fine-grain event listeners instead.
  • Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    org.helixj.core.Address​(NetworkParameters, String)
    Use Address.fromBase58(NetworkParameters, String)
    org.helixj.core.Block​(NetworkParameters, byte[])
    Use MessageSerializer.makeBlock(byte[]) instead.
    org.helixj.core.ChildMessage()
    Use instead.
    org.helixj.core.DumpedPrivateKey​(NetworkParameters, String)
    Use DumpedPrivateKey.fromBase58(NetworkParameters, String)
    org.helixj.core.ECKey​(byte[], byte[])
    org.helixj.core.Sha256Hash​(byte[])
    org.helixj.crypto.BIP38PrivateKey​(NetworkParameters, String)
    Use BIP38PrivateKey.fromBase58(NetworkParameters, String)
